mapper.select: SELECT hmt.transaction_id as recordId, hts.message_code, hts.message_name, hmt.trx_status_code as statusCode, hm.creation_date, hm.content, hws.webhook_address, hmt.transaction_message as errorInfo, hws.server_type as webHookType FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hmt.message_id = hm.message_id JOIN hmsg_webhook_server hws ON hws.server_code = hm.server_code JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh htsw ON htsw.server_code = hm.server_code JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.temp_server_line_id = htsw.temp_server_line_id AND hm.template_code = htsl.template_code JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsw.temp_server_id WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'WEB_HOOK' AND hmt.transaction_id=#{recordId}
